document.full_text: holder francesca schiavone whizzed past american melanie oudin 6-2 6-0 to reach the second round of the french open on monday.
document.title: holder schiavone wastes no time in ousting oudin
lines_and_colors: holder francesca schiavone whizzed past american melanie oudin 6-2 6-0 to reach the second round of the french open on monday.
